answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:

http://transformgov.org/en/jobads
Pam

answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
Hello Rachel, I am attaching the Administrative Assistant job description for the City of Virginia Beach.  It is range 16, with a pay range of $30,364.08 - $44,028.00.  Hope this helps.

answers.author: Matthew Reges
answers.text:
We have a Program Coordinator class that might be more in line with what you need. Compared to Administrative Assistant, this job has more related to evaluation and analysis, budgeting, IT, and public information, and less related to clerical work and office overhead. We have Program Coordinators in HR, Transit, and two currently vacant in Public works, so you can see on our job board how the general description gets tailored to specific needs: www.charlottesville.org/jobs.

author: Rachel Leininger
text: I am looking for management assistant job descriptions and salary requirements.  I am trying to put together job descriptions and salary requirements for a newly formed position.  If you could please send me examples that your cities have used that would be great!  Thanks in advance!
title: Management Assistant Job Descriptions and Salaries
